sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: REWAH a town of Hindustan, in the province of Gundwana, district of Boghela. The suburbs are large. Under the fort runs the Bichanaddy, which has its source twenty miles to the east. It contains a good citadel, built of stone, and the country in the vicinity is well cultivated. Long. 81. 25. E. Lat 24. 27. N.
